pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: Woodson Research Center Special Collections & Archives, Fondren Library
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Includes personal and business papers. Papers relating to KPRC are in Hobby's personal office files and range from early architectural drawings to licenses to instructions on how to run the switchboard. Also includes files from FCC hearings, 1955-1959, and a history of the station.
